welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Handsworth, a charming town in the heart of United Kingdom known for its vibrant culture and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and experience all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Robin Hood Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Robin Hood Airport is used for freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Nottingham Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Nottingham Airport handles the transportation of goods and packages.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
